title: Charli XCX flashes her honed abs in a crop top t as she takes to the stage in Toronto
text:
She's garnered critical acclaim for her third studio album.

And Charli XCX treated crowds to a selection of hits from her latest record Charli during a concert at Rebel Nightclub, Toronto, Canada on Tuesday.

The songstress, 27, flashed her washboard abs in a form-fitting white crop top, which she teamed with a pair of hot pink combat trousers for her performance.

Wow! Charli XCX treated crowds to a selection of hits from her latest record Charli during a concert at Rebel Nightclub, Toronto, Canada on Tuesday

She layered her look with an oversized pink shirt, while putting on an energetic display up on stage in front of a fun-loving crowd.

Charli continued her pink theme as she wore her vibrant ombre locks in a low ponytail, while accessorising with two large hair clips.

The songstress was joined on stage by American singer Slayyyter, who rocked a T-shirt dress and a pair of glitzy thigh-high sequinned boots.

What a babe: The songstress, 27, flashed her washboard abs in a form-fitting white crop top, which she teamed with a pair of hot pink combat trousers for her performance

Charli's sensational stage performance comes after she opened up the doors of her British inspired pad to Architectural Digest.

Speaking to the iconic interiors publication, the brunette explained: 'It's funny that I moved across the world and still ended up in an archetypal British house.

'I liked that this was an old place and immediately loved it. I love the dark wood. I love that it's a little creepy and weird. It just felt really right for me.'

Charli burst onto the scene after signing a contract with Asylum Records nearly a decade ago.

Stylish: She layered her look with an oversized pink shirt, while putting on an energetic display up on stage in front of a fun-loving crowd

She rose to fame working alongside Icona Pop in the classic hit I Love It before finding incredible commercial success singing the chorus to Iggy Azalea's smash song Fancy.

Over the years the star has also raked in money from lending her talents as a songwriter, including Willi.am’s Boys & Girls and Selena Gomez's Same Old Love.

Charli is now back with her new material for her self-tiled album, released September 13th, following a five year hiatus.

Pretty in pink: Charli continued her pink theme as she wore her vibrant ombre locks in a low ponytail, while accessorising with two large hair clips
description: Charli XCX treated crowds to a selection of hits from her latest record Charli during a concert at Rebel Nightclub, Toronto, Canada on Tuesday.
